title: Squirrel Hook
info: The Squirrel Hook is a pre-Hardmode grappling hook sold by the Zoologist for 2 at any time. It launches a single hook that reaches 19 tiles, and functions identically to a normal grappling hook, but will also attach to the trunks of Trees and Giant Glowing Mushrooms.
stat:
